claim: The Martian is based on Andy Weir's novel.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Andrew Taylor Weir  (  born June 16 , 1972  )  , commonly known by his pen name , Andy Weir , is an American novelist whose debut novel , The Martian , was later adapted into a film of the same name directed by Ridley Scott in 2015 .

claim: The Martian is based on Andy Weir's novel.
premise_source_doc_sentence: With the screenplay by Drew Goddard , based on the Andy Weir 's 2011 novel of the same name .

claim: The Martian is based on Andy Weir's novel.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Martian is a 2011 science fiction novel written by Andy Weir .
